nodes.text: The Survivor's Fund was a type of donation fund that was mentioned in the base recreation area of Ciutric IV, when Prince-Admiral Delak Krennel sent out an order for his troops to go to their ships. Corran Horn was at the time under cover within the Prince-Admiral's troops, along with the other members of Rogue Squadron. When the call came, he was engaged in a game of Sabacc with some of the other troops, and was informed, upon the call's arrival, that Sabacc pots abandoned in such a situation went to what was called the "Survivor's Fund," presumably a donation fund for the families of those killed in battle.
